item.title: Neal McDonough Says He “Couldn’t Get a Job” and “Hollywood Just Completely Turned on Me” by Having a No-Kissing Co-Stars Rule
item.description: The ‘Yellowstone’ and ‘Minority Report’ actor said he didn’t want to put his wife and kids through that.
